upgrade_to_pro_title: Built for active traders who want an edge.
upgrade_to_pro_subtitle: You do not need more headlines. You need the flow, catalysts, and context that move price. Pro puts real-time options and dark pool data, analyst moves, and deep history in one place so you can plan the trade, not chase it.
upgrade_to_pro_feature_data_desc: Get every dataset and tool across Stocknear so you can vet setups fast and act with conviction.
upgrade_to_pro_feature_flow_desc: Spot unusual activity and large prints as they happen to move before the crowd.
upgrade_to_pro_feature_analyst_desc: Track upgrades, downgrades, and price targets without chasing news.
upgrade_to_pro_feature_history_desc: Validate ideas with premium data and up to 30 years of history.
